protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: This is one of the several different receptors for 5- hydroxytryptamine (serotonin), a biogenic hormone that functions as a neurotransmitter, a hormone, and a mitogen. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Rees S, den Daas I, Foord S, Goodson S, Bull D, Kilpatrick G, Lee M: Cloning and characterisation of the human 5-HT5A serotonin receptor. FEBS Lett. 1994 Dec 5;355(3):242-6.
